name: Golf Charter - Japan Airlines 777-346ER [JA731J] Landing and Takeoff at Calgary Airport ᴴᴰ
description:
What a perfect way to end the summer! This very special Japan Airlines charter came in today to bring the PGA Tour Champions Players from the Shaw Charity Classic held in Calgary to the next event, the Japan Airlines Championship, held in Narita, Japan. Given the location of the next tournament, and the sponsor, it seems reasonable that Japan Airlines would send an aircraft for just that purpose, and what an awesome visitor! Here we have JA731J, wearing a special "PGA Tour Champions" livery, arriving at Calgary International Airport on 35R as an empty ferry in, and departing later that day with a full flight of golfers out to Tokyo-Narita. ATC is included, I hope you enjoy this fantastic rare visitor!

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Japan Airlines (JAL/JL)
Aircraft: Boeing 777-300ER (B77W)
Aircraft Name: 
Livery: "PGA Tour Champions"
Engines: 2x GE90-115B
Registration: JA731J
Route: Tokyo-Narita (NRT) - Calgary (YYC) - Tokyo-Narita (NRT)
Callsign: Japan Air 8912/8805 heavy
Runway used: 35R, 35R
Date filmed: September 3, 2017
Local time: 1430, 1930
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/JA731J
